out_file = os.path.join(self.test_folder, 'test_out')
gen_file(os.path.join(self.test_folder, 'aaa.gff'), self.example.gff_file)
ms.read_gff = Mock_func().mock_read_gff
gffs = {'merge': out_file, 'utr': 'UTR', 'normal': 'inter'}
ms.merge_srna_gff(gffs, False, 0.5, os.path.join(self.test_folder,
    'aaa.gff'), False)
datas, attributes = extract_info(out_file, 'file')
self.assertListEqual(datas, ['aaa\tANNOgesic\tncRNA\t54\t254\t.\t+\t.'])
self.assertEqual(set(attributes[0]), set(['overlap_cds=NA',
    'Name=sRNA_00000', 'ID=aaa_srna0', 'sRNA_type=intergenic',
    'end_cleavage=cleavage_40', 'with_TSS=TSS_3', 'overlap_percent=NA']))
